name: 甘奈
text: やっぱり、あのブックカフェ、いいな☆
trans: That book cafe was really nice.

name: 甘奈
text:
千雪さん、今日はありがと
また一緒に来られてめっちゃ楽しかった！
trans:
Thank you for today, Chiyuki.
It was fun coming again here!

name: 千雪
text:
ううん、こちらこそ
私もとっても楽しかったわ
trans: Thank you, too. I also enjoyed myself.

name: 千雪
text: それにしても、結構長居しちゃってたのね……！
trans: Still, we spent quite a long time there.

name: 甘奈
text:
つい長いことまったりしちゃうんだよねー！
いつの間にこんな時間！？　みたいな
trans:
We sure took our sweet time there!
Like to the point of "Wait, it's already this late!?"

name: 甘奈
text:
お店の雰囲気もいいし、
面白そうな本がたくさんあるからかなぁ……？
trans: Maybe it's because the store has a nice ambiance and have lots of interesting books?

name: 千雪
text:
そういえば甘奈ちゃん、何か買ってたけど……
どんな本を買ったの？
trans: Speaking of which, Amana, you seem to have bought something. What kind of book is it?

name: 甘奈
text:
うん☆　今日はねー
主人公がめっちゃかわいー女の子の小説と絵本を買ったの！
trans: Oh that. Well, I bought a novel which has a cute girl for its lead and a picture book!

name: 千雪
text:
可愛い女の子？
最近、流行ってる小説かしら？
trans: A cute girl? Is that the one that's quite popular right now?

name: 甘奈
text: ううん、教科書に載ってた小説なんだ
trans: No, it's a novel mentioned in our textbooks.

name: 甘奈
text: 先生が全部読んだら面白いって、授業中に言ってたの
trans: Our teacher said that we'll find it interesting once we read about it.

name: 千雪
text:
そっかぁ
教科書のお話って、ちゃんと読んでみると……
trans: I see. So, you decided to read the references mentioned in your textbook.

name: 千雪
text:
実は結構面白かったり
良い話だったりするもんね
trans: There are really interesting and good stories, aren't there?

name: 甘奈
text:
うんっ
だから、読むの楽しみにしてるんだ☆
trans: Yeah. That's why I can't wait to read them.

name: 甘奈
text: それと、絵本はこれ！
trans: As for the other one, it's this picture book!

name: 甘奈
text: 小さな頃に読んでもらってて、好きなお話だったの
trans: This one has been read to me when I was a kid and I liked its story.

name: 甘奈
text:
それで
甜花ちゃんと一緒に読んだら楽しいかな～って思ったんだ☆
trans: So, I thought this could be a fun read with Tenka.

name: 千雪
text: この絵本……私も読んだことがあるわ
trans: I've also read that picture book before.

name: 甘奈
text:
えっ、千雪さんもなんだ！
ついつい惹き込まれちゃうよねー
trans: Oh, you read it too! It sure makes you engrossed to it!

name: 千雪
text:
うん
私の弟がね、このお話が大好きで……
trans: Yes. And my little brother loves this story.

name: 千雪
text: 小さい頃はよく読み聞かせしてあげてたの
trans: I read it to him a lot when we were young.

name: 甘奈
text:
千雪さんの弟かぁ、この前写真見せてくれたよね
めっちゃかわいかった～
trans: Your little brother. You showed a picture of him before. He was so cute.

name: 千雪
text: ふふ、あれは小学生の頃の写真だけどね
trans: Fufu, although, that picture was when he was back in elementary.

name: 千雪
text:
昔は、カメラを向けたらすぐに
ポーズを取ってくれたんだけど……
trans: Before, when I point the camera at him, he immediately strikes into a pose.

name: 甘奈
text: 今は撮らせてくれないんだ？
trans: But, he doesn't let you take his picture anymore?

name: 千雪
text:
そうなの
『やだよ』って顔を隠されちゃって
trans: Yes. He turns me down and hides his face away.

name: 甘奈
text:
へー、そういう反応されるんだね
お姉ちゃんと弟だとそうなっちゃうのかな？
trans: Oh, he reacts like that. Does the relationship between big sister and her little brother always turn out like that?

name: 甘奈
text:
甘奈と甜花ちゃんは
今でも手を繋いだりするから
trans: I mean, Tenka and I still do things like holding hands.

name: 千雪
text:
ふふっ
ふたりはいつまでも仲良しね
trans: Fufu, the two of us are always getting along.

name: 甘奈
text:
えへへ、あ、でも、昔と反応が変わっちゃったりすると……
ちょっと寂しかったり？
trans: Ehehe, oh, but, if one person's reaction changes from what he usually does in the past... Isn't that a little sad?

name: 千雪
text: うーん……そんなことないかな
trans: Hmm... I don't think so.

name: 千雪
text:
今は今で
実家に戻った時はゆっくり話したりできるから……
trans: Whenever I go back home, we could still talk about things.

name: 甘奈
text:
そうなんだ
仲が悪くなっちゃったわけじゃないんだね
trans: I see. So, you two didn't stop getting along with each other.

name: 千雪
text:
そうね
もう子供の頃の関係とは違うけれど
trans: Yes. Although it's now different than when we were kids.

name: 甘奈
text: 違う関係、か……
trans: Different...

name: 千雪
text: ……甘奈ちゃん？
trans: ...Amana-chan?

name: 甘奈
text:
甘奈と甜花ちゃんの場合はどうだろ……
これからふたりの関係は変わっちゃったりするのかな……
trans: I wonder about me and Tenka... I wonder if our relationship would change in the future...

name: 千雪
text: ……変わるのは怖い？
trans: ...Are you afraid of change?

name: 甘奈
text:
怖いっていうよりもね……
あんまりそういうこと、思ったことがなくて……
trans: Not that I'm afraid but... It's just that I haven't thought about it much...

name: 甘奈
text:
今までも……そして今もずっと一緒だから……
考えられないっていうか……
trans: Up until now... And even right now, the two of us are always together... So, it's like I can't think of it happening...

name: 千雪
text: 甘奈ちゃん……
trans: Amana-chan...

name: 千雪
text: ……きっと、大丈夫！
trans: I'm sure that it will be alright!

name: 甘奈
text: ！　千雪さん……
trans: Chiyuki...

name: 千雪
text:
私もね……
変わっていくことは、少し寂しかったけれど
trans: It's the same with me. I'm also afraid of things changing but...

name: 千雪
text:
それは『関係が成長した』
ってことなんじゃないかなって思うの
trans: I think that that's a sign that our relationship has grown.

name: 千雪
text:
私たち自身が大人になったり、
変わっていくように……ね？
trans: Like us oursleves will change into grown-ups. Don't you agree?

name: 甘奈
text: ……そっかぁ
trans: ...I see.

name: 甘奈
text:
『関係が成長』……
そんなふうにも考えられるんだ……
trans: Our relationship has grown... you could think of it like that...

name: 甘奈
text:
それってなんだか……
すごく素敵な感じがするね……！
trans: And... that seems like a wonderful thing!

name: 甘奈
text:
甘奈たちのこれからが、もっと楽しくなりそうな気がするよ
ありがと！　千雪さんっ
trans: I feel like the relationship between me and Tenka will become even more fun. Thank you, Chiyuki!
